directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain, and rinse with cold water.
In a large bowl, combine pasta with tomatoes, cheese, salami, pepperoni, green pepper, olives, and pimentos. Pour in salad dressing, and toss to coat.
ingredients: 1/4 pound sliced pepperoni, cut in half
1 large green bell pepper, cut into 1 inch pieces
title: Awesome Pasta Salad
